html: Earlier today, @sendavidperdue and I, along with dozens of our colleagues, introduced resolutions in the House and Senate to recognize that America's national debt is a threat to our national security. STATEMENTS: https://bit.ly/2NvRwiy pic.twitter.com/iaeAILGqLy
text:

html: In Rio Grande Valley sector today at the southern border. Brownsville area has 35 miles of fencing and accounts for 6% of illegal apprehensions. McAllen, 45 minutes to the west, has sparse fencing and accounts for 94% of illegal apprehensions. But walls don’t work, right?
text:
In Rio Grande Valley sector today at the southern border.
 
Brownsville area has 35 miles of fencing and accounts for 6% of illegal apprehensions.
 
McAllen, 45 minutes to the west, has sparse fencing and accounts for 94% of illegal apprehensions.
 
But walls don’t work, right?

text:
Build the wall.

Give our Border Patrol agents the resources they deserve.

Improve our existing technology.

Construct drivable roads along the fences.

We can secure the border. We can protect U.S. citizens. It will take resolve, but Congress can - and must - get this done.pic.twitter.com/mBaWHAOp5Y

text: Cindy and I wish everyone in #AZ05 a happy new year. Let's make 2019 one to remember. Thankful to serve this district into another year.pic.twitter.com/MjUBPPtEWE

html: LOOKING BACK AT THE 115th CONGRESS: I’ve answered thousands of letters & emails from constituents on a number of topics. Many of these responses have been sent out via postal mail, and I’m grateful to my staff for helping me ready the letters for delivery. #AZ05pic.twitter.com/rjQ4ZGdbKB
text:
LOOKING BACK AT THE 115th CONGRESS:

I’ve answered thousands of letters & emails from constituents on a number of topics. Many of these responses have been sent out via postal mail, and I’m grateful to my staff for helping me ready the letters for delivery. #AZ05pic.twitter.com/rjQ4ZGdbKB

html: LAST BUT NOT LEAST - @CongressmanHice joined me on the final episode for 2018 to look back on the 115th Congress and to look forward to the 116th Congress. html: Sen. Jon Kyl has given decades of his life to serve the U.S. in office, and Arizona has reaped many rewards from his efforts in Congress. Before he retired (again) from the Senate, I had the honor of interviewing him for episode #26. LISTEN:https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/setting-the-example-for-public-servants-with-sen-jon-kyl …

html: America has a special alliance with Israel, and I am pleased with the efforts of @POTUS @realDonaldTrump & this Congress to grow our friendship. I interviewed @davidhorovitz of the @TimesofIsrael about the state of our alliance. LISTEN to episode #25:https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/commemorating-americas-alliance-with-israel-with-david-horovitz …
